snippet.title: The King's Campaign Trailer
snippet.description:
The King's Campaign is a hybrid of Grand Strategy and Real-Time Strategy gameplay set in Medieval Europe and North Africa, where you manage your cities, engage in diplomacy and direct your armies on the world map before plunging into battle and commanding your troops directly on the battlefield

Coming Soon to Steam! Wishlist Today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2374280/The_Kings_Campaign/
